subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: The Future of Islam
description: One-minute skill: The Future of Islam.

hook.text: By 2070, Islam will be the world's largest religion. How it evolves will shape this century more than any other force.

buildup.text: Muslim populations are young and growing, especially in Africa and Asia. Demographic momentum is unstoppable.

discovery.text: Reform movements are growing. Young Muslims use social media to reinterpret faith, challenge clerics, and debate openly.

twist.text: The biggest tension is internal: traditional authority vs. individual reading. The internet empowers the layperson.

climax.text: Islam's future depends on an ancient question: who speaks for God? Increasingly, the answer is everyone.

punchline.text: By 2070, Islam leads the world. Its internal debate will shape us all.

quiz.question: What is projected for Islam by 2070?
options: It will become the world's largest religion
It will stay the same size
